TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to edit SCA Configuration for Average Speed Camera.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Average Speed Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Average Speed Tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Average Speed Tab.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter KSI Per Year.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter KSI Per Year.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter KSI Per Year.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Major Junction PIC Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Urban PIC Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Urban PIC Value.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to enter Rural PIC Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to enter Rural PIC Value.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to enter Rural PIC Value.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click Save button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click Save button.
